item.title: Deleting Spam Tweets from my Account
item.description: A long time ago, on December 5, 2015 to be precise, my twitter account was compromised such that each of my followers were sent a tweet containing a different tumblr blog profile. How exactly this happened I havenâ€™t a clue about, but all this spam did leave me perplexed. Have a look at the following: Sigh. Today, I am going to cleanse it all using the twitter API libraries for R namely: rtweet & twitteR.
